p: Most of enzymes, such as phosphoribulokinase (PRK), phosphoglyceratekinase (PGK), RuBP carboxylase (rubisco), fructose‐bisphosphatase aldolase (ALDO), and glyceraldehyde phosphate dehydrogenase (GAPDH), plays an important role in the carbon fixation process (Huang et al., 2017; Silveira & Carvalho, 2016). Many DEGs, such as rbcL, PGK, GAPDH, and ALDO, were upregulated, which might enhance carbon synthesis in S. canadensis under shade conditions.
